issue.title: [C++] Bump xsimd to latest version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13944](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13944). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
xsimd is refactored to use architecture instead of register size to define a batch.
I've adapted arrow code to this change.
There's one xsimd bug [1] needs to fix before we can upgrade.
[1] https://github.com/xtensor-stack/xsimd/pull/553
